liquidate-dto-contracts.title: Liquidate DTO Contract Desyncs
liquidate-dto-contracts.instruction_raw: Draft a SPEC to fix BorrowerProfileDTO signature errors and residual LoanInfoDTO subscripting across Firm logic and 700+ tests. Ensure all keyword arguments match the frozen dataclass definition. Refer to TD-DTO-DESYNC-2026.

liquidate-loan-market.title: Liquidate LoanMarket Dict-Leak
liquidate-loan-market.instruction_raw: Draft a SPEC to resolve the AttributeError in loan_market.py where a 'dict' is returned instead of a LoanInfoDTO object. Trace the origin in bank.stage_loan and ensure dot notation is used throughout.

liquidate-regressions.title: Implement Behavioral Regression Fixes
liquidate-regressions.instruction_raw: Fix firm inventory slots and housing transaction protocols to resolve residual test failures. Maintain zero-sum integrity.

modernize-omo-tests.title: Modernize OMO & Settlement Tests (SSoT Alignment)
modernize-omo-tests.instruction_raw: Draft a SPEC to refactor test_omo_system.py and test_atomic_settlement.py. Replace direct Agent.assets checks with settlement_system.get_balance() as per TEST_REFRACTORING_GUIDE.md. Resolve existing 500 != (500 +/- 100) failures.

modernize-bailout-tests.title: Modernize Bailout & DTO Signature Tests
modernize-bailout-tests.instruction_raw: Draft a SPEC to fix BailoutCovenant attribute errors (executive_salary_freeze vs bonus) and BorrowerProfileDTO signature desyncs in remaining test files. Ensure mocks return strict Dataclasses.

modernize-regression-tests.title: Modernize General Behavioral Regressions
modernize-regression-tests.instruction_raw: Draft a SPEC to resolve logic regressions in judicial systems and manufacturing ratios. Ensure all balance assertions query the SSoT.
